cards.detail: {{#patient}}You recently had high blood pressure readings (>140 systolic or > 90 diastolic) which suggests hypertension, but no diagnosis is in your chart.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}Patient had multiple blood pressure readings of SBP > 140mm Hg and/or DBP > 90.
